items.sentence: Tom hasn't yet asked anyone else to do this.
Mary's purse is the same color as her shoes.
Tom is going to get deported from Australia.
Tom has ordered enough food to feed an army.
Tom was on the porch just a few minutes ago.
Tom had a stomachache and went to bed early.
Tom is one of the most talented guys I know.
That's one of the pictures I took yesterday.
I think that Tom was one of the ringleaders.
Tom was asked a question he couldn't answer.
Tom has been taken downtown for questioning.
Buy me another beer and I'll think about it.
Mary searched frantically through her purse.
I suspect Tom will probably want to do that.
I try to walk at least thirty minutes a day.
You should do everything Tom asks you to do.
What kind of person would you like to marry?
I hope that Tom wasn't injured in the crash.
The last thing I ate yesterday was an apple.
Do you think that Tom could drive Mary home?
